property-description: The structure vector descriptors for each atom.

number-of-knots.description: The number of knots used for the splines. Assumed to be uniformly-spaced between inner/outer cutoff

inner-boundary-condition.description: The boundary condition used for the left-most knot. Must be 'fixed' or 'natural'.

outer-boundary-condition.description: The boundary condition used for the left-most knot. Must be 'fixed' or 'natural'.

inner-cutoff.description: The position of the left-most knot of the radial splines.

outer-cutoff.description: The position of the right-most knot of the radial splines.

two-body.description: Structure vectors corresponding to the pair interactions.

three-body.description: Structure vectors corresponding to the triplet interactions.
